name: BackSeat Driving
description:
In this game you control a car split in twain connected by a chain. 

You use the left and right  arrow keys to rotate the backside of the car around the front to change its direction. 

Use the up key to charge a boost (this also locks the frontside of the car's direction). 

I recommend testing the mechanics in the Test drive mode. 

Good luck, and please, don't break your keyboard
